content: अपष्ठु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अप-स्था कु <ls>Uṇ. 1. 25</ls>; <ls>P. VIII. 3. 98</ls>] {@--1@} Contrary, opposite. {@--2@} Unfavourable, adverse, perverse. {@--3@} Left. --ष्ठु {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} {@--1@} Contrary, in the contrary or opposite way or direction. {@--2@} Falsely, untruly, wrongly; तव धंर्मराज इति नाम कथमिदमपष्ठु पठ्यते <ls>Śi. 15. 17</ls>; अपष्ठु पठतः पाठ्यमधिगोष्ठि शठस्य ते <ls>N.</ls> {@--3@} Faultlessly. {@--4@} Well, properly, handsomely. --ष्ठुः Time.
